info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 3:58PM PDT until August 15 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO, SAN BERNARDINO, SOUTHERN NYE AND WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 358 PM PDT, Heavy rainfall of between a half an inch and 1 inch has been detected near Tecopa road and Charleston View. Flash Flooding continues. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump, Sandy Valley and Tecopa. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
